post: The Bill of Rights Institute would like to thank Sappi for their generous donation to the Power of the Printed Word. Sappi is a global renewable resource company that uses every part of the tree to make every day more sustainable. To learn more about Sappi, visit  https://www.sappi.com/. Printers from across the country have been supporting the Power of the Printed Word. Read more about this initiative and the support BRI has received so far, here  https://lnkd.in/eAA2hHpr.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #PowerofthePrintedWord

Claim your 2025 Celebrating History Wall Calendar today! For a donation of $25 or more, you will receive a calendar that teaches and reflects on moments and people who have shaped American history. Each month highlights key historical events and important dates in our nations past that represent Founding principles and civic virtues that connect us as Americans. Visit  https://lnkd.in/eJtYG4_S to claim your calendar today!  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #2025calendar

Join Dr. Condoleezza Rice as she delves into the enduring experiment of American self-governance and the vital role of civil society in preserving our democratic institutions. In this insightful discussion, Dr. Rice emphasizes how young people can lead the charge in sustaining the foundations of our democracy. Watch here,  https://lnkd.in/gubwU4sh This video is part of the Bill of Rights Institutes Constitution Day Live 2024 program. This years theme, Built for This: Debate, Dialogue, and the Constitution, explores the structures and institutions that have kept our government stable, trustworthy, and protective of individual rights.. Missed Bill of Rights Institute's Constitution Day 2024? Watch here:  https://lnkd.in/gA-zn4w8  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #CDL2024

Are you a Federal employee or retiree? Then GIVE HAPPY to the Bill of Rights Institute through the Combined Federal Campaign using charity code 36265. One of the great benefits of the CFC is that you can give through payroll deduction or through your retiree annuity, giving a little each pay period and supporting BRI's mission all year long. Visit  https://givecfc.org/ and use code 36265.  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #GiveCFC

Education cause area provides a wide range of services including STEM, Early Education, Colleges & Universities, Continuing Education, Vocational Training, Educational Infrastructure & Facilities, Educator Training, Special Education, Study Abroad Programs, Social Sciences, and Cultural Studies. Donate to Education-supporting charities at U. S. Office of Personnel Management (OPM)‘s GiveCFC.org today to help make an impact.  #GiveCFC

The Bill of Rights Institute is grateful for the donations of the following companies: LSVT Global, Inc., Next Level Speech Therapy, P. C, APP2Speak®, Speak for Yourself (Heidi LoStracco, MS, CCC-SLP). Interested in supporting? Visit  https://lnkd.in/ePsJtSJy.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #civicseducation

Are you a Federal employee or retiree? Then GIVE HAPPY to the Bill of Rights Institute through the Combined Federal Campaign using charity code 36265. One of the great benefits of the CFC is that you can give through payroll deduction or through your retiree annuity, giving a little each pay period and supporting BRI's mission all year long. Visit  https://givecfc.org/ and use code 36265.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #GiveCFC

Its easy to GIVE HAPPY by donating a little from each paycheck or pledging a few volunteer hours a month at GiveCFC.org. The online giving system allows you to easily renew your pledge each year and offers the full range of options: Payroll deduction (the most popular!), Credit/debit card, E-check/bank transfer, and Volunteer hours (Federal employees only). Other options include paper pledge forms, the CFC Giving Mobile App, and Text-to-Donate. Learn more at U. S. Office of Personnel Management (OPM)‘s GiveCFC.org.  #GiveCFC

Looking for another way to support civic education? At the Bill of Rights Institute, we are proud to partner with organizations and companies that support civic educationand Federal Flags, LLC wants to give back to the same cause you support. When you purchase a flag using the code 'BRI,' Federal Flags will donate a portion of each sale to support the Bill of Rights Institute and civic education. Visit  https://lnkd.in/eFFbmjbM).  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #Americanflags

What happens when we deprioritize civics in American schools – and what is it going to take to drive meaningful change? These are some of the questions Bill of Rights Institute President and CEO David Bobb tackles in his latest op-ed, "Do they even teach civics anymore?" Civic education provides students the unique opportunity to understand how our nation and communities function and their roles in civil society,  he writes. All students deserve this knowledge, not just some students.  Read more here,  https://lnkd.in/gR7jqQz4  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #civiceducation

Have you heard? The Bill of Rights Institute has partnered with patriotic tea brand, Star Spangled Tea. Star Spangled Tea is honored to partner with the Bill of Rights Institute. We staunchly support our Constitution and the rights established by our founding fathers. We endorse the BRI's mission of educating the upcoming generation about the Constitution as a vital step towards responsible citizenship.  Roger Owens, CEO & Co-Founder of Star Spangled Tea Interested in purchasing your favorite tea? Use code 'BRI1791' at checkout. Every purchase helps support BRI's mission. Visit  https://lnkd.in/ePcjT8CU.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #tea
